name: Socks of Ages
description:
HOW TO PLAY

- Your objective is to pair with a suitor and obtain an heir.

- If you die without an heir, your dynasty ends and you lose.

- The more aesthetic elements you have in common with a suitor, the greater will be the probability of having a child with them.

- You can change your appearance by buying aesthetics cards on the bottom.

- You can reroll suitors by pressing the relative button.

- Each action (pairing, aesthetic card purchase and reroll) costs longevity (the reroll action should cost 2 longevity, but currently does not work).

- Longevity is displayed under your character. When longevity ends, your character dies.

- Characters have 2 traits: 1 positive and 1 negative. They can be inherited by your prole. Higher rank traits are more difficult to transmit.
